attributes.additional_details: Government should actively encourage its MPs to take the time to visit the streets of their constituencies across the country, on a weekly or monthly basis, and seek the views of those they purport to represent, so that on issues which have profound and potentially damaging long term impacts on our society, true democracy will save us from the scandal of selling out to Europe, and submitting to directives which ensure the safety and the so-called rights of criminals and terrorists, over the rights of indigenous majorities.
